Options API: provide().description: Provide values that can be injected by descendant components.

Options API: inject[].description: Declare properties to inject into the current component by locating them from ancestor providers.

Options API: extends.description:
Type: Object | Function.
Allows one component to extend another, inheriting its component options.

Options API: mixins[].description:
Type: Array<Object>.
An array of option objects to be mixed into the current component.
